resume_text:
TISHA VARMA
Ahmedabad, India | Phone: +919377251777 | Email: varmatisha0@gmail.com | GitHub: https://github.com/tisha-varma |
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/tisha-varma/ | LeetCode: https://leetcode.com/u/_tisha_2810/
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
AI Engineer with hands-on experience building LLM-powered and agentic AI systems using Python. Skilled in agent orchestration,
embeddings, prompt engineering, and backend API development. Built multi-agent workflows, resume analysis systems, and computer
vision applications. Strong builder mindset with hackathon wins and consistent DSA practice.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Programming: Python, Java, Solidity
AI & LLMs: LLMs, Agentic AI, Prompt Engineering, NLP, Embeddings, RAG concepts, Computer Vision, OCR
Agent Frameworks: CrewAI, Multi-agent workflows
Backend & Tools: FastAPI, Flask, REST APIs, Git, Async Python basics
Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, Vector DB concepts
AI Coding Tools: Codex, Claude Code, Cursor, Antigravity, GitHub Copilot
PROJECTS
Career Copilot AI – Resume & Job Description Analysis Platform
● Technologies: Python, FastAPI, NLP, LLMs, Embeddings, ATS Parsing
● Built an AI-based system to analyze resumes against job descriptions and highlight skill gaps and keyword mismatches.
● Implemented resume parsing and JD processing pipelines to extract skills, experience, and role requirements.
● Generated ATS-aware resume improvement suggestions using LLMs and developed RESTful backend APIs using FastAPI.
Smart Multi-Agent Daily Planner (Agentic AI – Kaggle Project)
● Technologies: Python, CrewAI, LLMs
● Built a multi-agent AI workflow using Large Language Models that reduced manual planning effort by ~60%.
HerDefenders – AI-Powered Women’s Safety System (SSIP Approved Startup Project)
● Technologies: Python, Machine Learning, OpenCV, CCTV Analytics
● Developed real-time threat detection using computer vision and CCTV footage analytics.
PharmaMate – OCR-Based Medication Assistant
● Technologies: Python, OCR, Machine Learning
● Built an OCR pipeline to extract text from handwritten medical prescriptions.
● Automated dosage interpretation to reduce manual reading errors.
EXPERIENCE
Machine Learning Intern | InfoLabz IT Services Pvt. Ltd. | Jul 2023 – Sep 2023
● Supported development of machine learning workflows and Python-based automation
● Worked with OpenCV on image processing tasks and experimentation
Open Source Contributor | GitHub
● Implemented features, fixed bugs, and improved documentation through code contributions and pull requests in open-source
repositories.
PROBLEM SOLVING & DATA STRUCTURES | LeetCode, GeeksforGeeks.
● Solved 150+ algorithmic problems using Python. [Arrays, Strings, Stacks, Queues, Trees, Graphs]
ACHIEVEMENTS
● Winner – HackSprint Hackathon (2026) | Google Developer Groups on Campus, SSIU
● Finalist – Google Girl Hackathon 2025
● Finalist – Tic Tech Toe Hackathon, DAIICT (2025) and Hackathon Grand Finale (SSIP + Gujarat Knowledge Society)
EDUCATION & TRAINING
Bachelor of Engineering – Information Technology | L.D. College of Engineering | 2024 – 2027 | CGPA: 9.2/ 10
Diploma – Information Technology | Gujarat Technological University | 2021 – 2024 | CGPA: 9.7 / 10
Agentic AI – 5 Day Intensive Course | Kaggle × Google

strengths: Hands-on experience with AI and LLMs
Experience with agent orchestration and embeddings
Strong problem-solving skills with 150+ algorithmic problems solved
Consistent DSA practice and hackathon wins

roadmap.expected_outcome: Design and implement deep learning models using TensorFlow or PyTorch, and apply them to real-world problems
Deploy and manage AI models on cloud platforms, and leverage their services for data storage, processing, and analytics
Containerize AI models and applications using Docker, and ensure efficient deployment and management
Apply DevOps principles to AI model development, including continuous integration, testing, and deployment
Implement automated workflows for AI model deployment, monitoring, and maintenance on cloud platforms

analysis.analysis_notes: The candidate has a strong foundation in AI, LLMs, and programming skills, with hands-on experience in relevant areas. However, they lack experience in deep learning frameworks and cloud platforms, which are essential for an AI Engineer role. With some additional training and experience, they can fill the gaps and become a strong fit for the role.

reflection.reason: The role fit score of 80 indicates a strong alignment with the target role, and the 5 learning roadmap items provide a clear and manageable path for addressing skill gaps, allowing the candidate to effectively prepare for the AI Engineer position.

videos.title: Search: Cloud-based DevOps for AI tutorial

job_tips: Tailor your resume for each application
Follow up after submitting your application

technical.question: Tell me about your technical background.
How do you approach learning new technologies?
Describe a challenging project you worked on.
technical.tip: Use STAR method and highlight your contributions.

behavioral.question: Why are you interested in this role?
behavioral.tip: Connect your skills to the job requirements.

behavioral.question: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

interview_tips: Research the company before the interview
Prepare questions to ask the interviewer
Use the STAR method for behavioral questions
Practice coding problems if it's a technical role
Follow up with a thank-you email within 24 hours

job_strategy.elevator_pitch: As an AI Engineer with hands-on experience building LLM-powered and agentic AI systems, I leverage my expertise in agent orchestration, embeddings, and backend API development to drive innovation. With projects like Career Copilot AI and Smart Multi-Agent Daily Planner, I've demonstrated my ability to apply AI and LLMs to real-world problems, and I'm excited to bring my skills to a new challenge.

top_selling_points.point: Building a multi-agent AI workflow using Large Language Models that reduced manual planning effort by ~60% in the Smart Multi-Agent Daily Planner project
top_selling_points.how_to_use: Emphasize the impact of this project on efficiency and productivity, and explain how this experience can be applied to optimize workflows in a potential employer's organization

top_selling_points.point: Developing a real-time threat detection system using computer vision and CCTV footage analytics in the HerDefenders project
top_selling_points.how_to_use: Highlight the potential for this technology to be applied in various industries, such as security or surveillance, and discuss how this experience demonstrates your ability to work with computer vision and machine learning

top_selling_points.point: Creating an OCR-based medication assistant, PharmaMate, to extract text from handwritten medical prescriptions and automate dosage interpretation
top_selling_points.how_to_use: Discuss the potential for this technology to improve healthcare outcomes and reduce medical errors, and explain how this project demonstrates your ability to apply AI and machine learning to real-world problems

target_companies.why: These companies would value my experience with LLMs, agentic AI, and computer vision, as well as my ability to develop innovative AI-powered solutions
target_companies.examples: Companies like Nuro, People.ai, or Zoox

target_companies.why: My experience with OCR-based medication assistants and real-time threat detection systems could be valuable in this industry, particularly in companies focused on medical imaging or patient safety
target_companies.examples: Companies like Athenahealth, Optum, or Medtronic

target_companies.why: My strong problem-solving skills and experience with machine learning and AI could be valuable in a research setting, particularly in institutions focused on AI, computer vision, or NLP
target_companies.examples: Institutions like MIT, Stanford, or Carnegie Mellon

networking_tips: Reach out to professionals working in AI startups or research institutions, and ask for their insights on the latest developments in LLMs and agentic AI
Attend conferences or meetups focused on AI, machine learning, and computer vision to learn about new technologies and network with potential employers
Connect with other developers and researchers on platforms like GitHub or Kaggle, and collaborate on projects or share knowledge and expertise

application_strategy.customize_for: The specific job requirements and company focus, highlighting relevant skills and experiences from my resume
application_strategy.highlight_project: The Career Copilot AI project, as it demonstrates my ability to develop innovative AI-powered solutions and apply LLMs to real-world problems
application_strategy.address_gaps: By emphasizing my strong foundation in machine learning and AI, and highlighting my willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies, such as deep learning frameworks and cloud platforms, and discussing how my experience with agent orchestration and embeddings can be applied to other areas, such as DevOps and containerization
